oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Soldiers' record for William C. Summers
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Framed ceremonial certificate for William Clellie Summers (1888-1947) giving date of service from Sept. 17, 1917 to Apr. 16, 1919. Includes 8 photographs of soldiers going through training. Copyright by H. H. Stratton, Chattanooga, Tenn., 1917. Summers served in Co. M, 117th Inf. Regt., 30th Div. He was Private, 1st Class at time of discharge from service. He was a farmer from Oakdale, Morgan County, Tenn., and he returned to the farm after the war. He died in a hunting accident in 1947.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
